docs.snippet: PETROPOLIS, Brazil, Aug. 30 -- The Treaty of Rio de Janeiro for hemispheric security was formally and unanimously adopted by the delegations of the nineteen nations in the Inter-American Conference here a few minutes before 5 P.M. today.
docs.lead_paragraph: PETROPOLIS, Brazil, Aug. 30 -- The Treaty of Rio de Janeiro for hemispheric security was formally and unanimously adopted by the delegations of the nineteen nations in the Inter-American Conference here a few minutes before 5 P.M. today.

headline.main: AMERICAS' TREATY OF DEFENSE VOTED AT RIO CONFERENCE; Approval of All 19 Republics Given in Plenary Session -- Signing to Be Tuesday OPEN TO 3 MORE NATIONS Ecuador, Nicaragua, Canada May Join -- Pact a Victory for Marshall, Vandenberg AMERICAS' TREATY VOTED AT PARLEY

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Aug. 31 -- Termination of the British mandate in Palestine and partition of the Holy Land into two independent states, one Arab and the other Jewish, were recommended tonight by a majority of the United Nations Special Committee...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Aug. 31 -- Termination of the British mandate in Palestine and partition of the Holy Land into two independent states, one Arab and the other Jewish, were recommended tonight by a majority of the United Nations Special Committee on Palestine.

docs.snippet: The General Electric Company's switch to peacetime activity in marine propulsion includes the supplying of turbine-electric drive units for the newest of American-flag luxury liners and an important role in the reconversion of wartime cargo vessels,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The General Electric Company's switch to peacetime activity in marine propulsion includes the supplying of turbine-electric drive units for the newest of American-flag luxury liners and an important role in the reconversion of wartime cargo vessels, company officials said yesterday.

headline.main: GE PROPULSION UNITS GOING INTO NEW SHIPS

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- Plans for a 1950 "Census of the Americas" were started here today by representatives of fifteen Western Hemisphere countries. The taking of this census is the first aim of a special committee of the International Statistical...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- Plans for a 1950 "Census of the Americas" were started here today by representatives of fifteen Western Hemisphere countries. The taking of this census is the first aim of a special committee of the International Statistical Institute.

headline.main: EXPERTS OUTLINE AMERICAS' CENSUS; Delegates From 15 Countries Set Standards for Tabulating Human, Economic Resources

byline.original: By WALTER H. WAGGONERSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- An aspect of the two reports to the United Nations by its Special Committee on Palestine that has impressed high officials here is that both the majority and the minority groups concede great merit to the case for a Jewish...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- An aspect of the two reports to the United Nations by its Special Committee on Palestine that has impressed high officials here is that both the majority and the minority groups concede great merit to the case for a Jewish homeland.

docs.snippet: Extensive hull repairs on the 20,183 -ton Moore-McCormack liner Uruguay were completed at the Todd Shipyards Corporation's Brooklyn division Friday and the vessel is now tied up at the "Long Dock'' in Section 20 of Erie Basin. Brooklyn, awaiting the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Extensive hull repairs on the 20,183 -ton Moore-McCormack liner Uruguay were completed at the Todd Shipyards Corporation's Brooklyn division Friday and the vessel is now tied up at the "Long Dock'' in Section 20 of Erie Basin. Brooklyn, awaiting the end of the shipyard strike so that her reconversion can be completed.

docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Sept. 6 -- Following is a supplementary list of items, made public today by United Nations headquarters, for the agenda, of the second regular session of the General Assembly, which opens Sept. 16: 1. Protection of the rights of the General Assembly in relation to the admission of new members: Item proposed by Australia.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Sept. 6 -- The Argentine delegation to this Inter-American Conference will be back in Buenos Aires next week, leaving behind Foreign Minister Juan A. Bramuglia's signature as sixteenth of the nineteen names on the new hemisphere...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Sept. 6 -- The Argentine delegation to this Inter-American Conference will be back in Buenos Aires next week, leaving behind Foreign Minister Juan A. Bramuglia's signature as sixteenth of the nineteen names on the new hemisphere defense treaty.
